name: Project "FPS LOW POLY"
description:
Project "FPS LOW POLY" is a Low Poly Survival game in it's enfancy. Up until now you only got a few items, some Placeables and a few Mechanics.

!!CAUTION!! THE SAVE FUNCTION ONLY SAVES THE INVENTORY AND SOME STATS!! ALL BUILDINGS WILL BE GONE AFTER RESTARTING THE GAME!!

It is the First Game i ever made. I started the Project in March of 2020 and i only worked on it a Month in Worktime. Because i had to Learn Unreal (The engine behind FPS LOW POLY) it was hard to work on it.

If you're interested in Updates and maybe even send me suggestions on stuff i should put in the Game, visit the FPS LOW POLY Discord server (link : https://discord.gg/pDxPph5).

Again, it is my first game and unfinished so go easy on me.
